name: Planner - Bomberos
description:
First release of Bomberos' planner.

It is based on how many days are booked for a project. You can put half a day or a full day within the weeks.


Calculate remaining days with Bomberos Tracker plugin.


Download plugin: https://www.figma.com/community/plugin/969640081521886230/Bomberos-Tracker


This is just a start, we can't wait to implement new features. Any comment and contribution is welcome!
